AuthVerify.title: Verification
AuthVerify.description: We have sent an email with verification code to {email}. Please copy and paste the code or type it below.

VerificationEmail.subject: Login verification code
VerificationEmail.preview: Use code {CODE} to verify your email address and log in.
VerificationEmail.title: Login verification code
VerificationEmail.description: Your verification code is below - copy and paste or type it on the "Verification" screen to log in.
VerificationEmail.warning: If you did not request this email, there's nothing to worry about, you can safely ignore it.
